About Me

Let me tell u a few things...

BIO

Let me introduce myself real quick. My name is Jan, I'm 24 years old and I come from small village near Kranj. By education I am computer technician but currently I'm finishing Associate's degree at College for catering and tourism Bled. Yes I know, completely different things but I wanted to gain experiences from foreign languages, business skills and communication strategies, that's why I went there. You know what they say, the more you know the more you are worth.
I'm currently working with HTML, CSS, SASS & JavaScript to make awesome websites and some Photoshop and SonyVegas to promote YouTube music from various generes such as Chillstep, Ambient & Lo-Fi music. In my free time I'm restoring rusty items. Basically hand work. You can learn more about my work if you click "Projects" in nav menu. Below you can see all of my previous work.

Solvera Lynx d.d

Software tester

At first I was responsible for internal time tracking software and it's maintenance. My first task was to build new feature of the app to help other co workers see if they are on vacations on a specific date or not. So if a developer for example wanted to talk about the new feature with the business owner on monday, he will see that he is not working that day and he would prostpone the meeting. Later on i started with GUI , software testing using TestComplete and Selenium testing tools.
